document_data.name: Carina Tchazzam
document_data.mainbody: '''Carina Tchazzam''' was a member of the [[nobility of Waterdeep|nobility]] of [[Waterdeep]] and the heiress to the [[Tchazzam]] family in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite web enhancement/Noble Houses of Waterdeep|7}} She died before assuming control of the family.
document_data.Relationships: Carina was the sister of [[Ulboth Tchazzam]], the patriarch of the Tchazzam family in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century DR. She also had a younger brother named [[Tarlon Tchazzam]].
document_data.History:
Carina became heir to the Tchazzam family after her nephew, Ulboth's only son and heir [[Corahk Tchazzam]], disappeared in the {{YearlinkName|1362}}, and was presumed dead.

She was killed in the {{YearlinkName|1371}}, when her pet cat was turned into a [[beast of Xvim]] and attacked her. This left Tarlon as the new heir.
